SVGAttributeClip.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The clip attribute is a presentation attribute defining the visible region of an element.

remarks.para: This attribute has the same parameter values as defined for the clip. Unitless values, which indicate current user coordinates, are permitted on the coordinate values on the rect(). The value of auto defines a clipping path along the bounds of the viewport created by the given element.
